page_summaries.content:
BZX84WCx Zener Voltage Regulator Diode in SC-70
1 Features
• Total power dissipation: 360mW (max)
• Low I/O capacitance: 80pF (max)
• Low leakage current: 0.6μA (max)
• Tolerance: ±5%
• Temperature range: -55°C to +150°C
• Leaded package used for automatic optical inspection (AOI)
2 Applications
• Voltage regulation
• Over-voltage protection
3 Description
The BZX84WCx is a family of voltage regulating diodes in a SC-70 package. The diodes are available in Zener voltages ranging from 8.2V to 39V.

Product Summary.content: The BZX84WCx is a family of Zener voltage regulator diodes in a SC-70 leaded package designed for automatic optical inspection (AOI). It features a low total power dissipation of 360mW (max), low I/O capacitance of 80pF (max), and low leakage current of 0.6μA (max). The diodes have a voltage tolerance of ±5% and an operating temperature range of -55°C to +150°C.

The BZX84WCx Zener diodes are suitable for voltage regulation and over-voltage protection applications. They are available in Zener voltages ranging from 8.2V to 39V, with automotive-qualified versions (Q1) available for high-reliability applications targeting zero defects.

Key features of the BZX84WCx Zener diodes include low power dissipation of 360mW (max), low I/O capacitance of 80pF (max), low leakage current of 0.6μA (max), voltage tolerance of ±5%, and a wide temperature range of -55°C to +150°C. The leaded SC-70 package is designed for automatic optical inspection (AOI).

The BZX84WCx family of Zener voltage regulator diodes in SC-70 package is suitable for voltage regulation and over-voltage protection applications, with automotive-qualified versions available for high-reliability applications targeting zero defects. The diodes offer low power dissipation, low capacitance, low leakage current, and a wide temperature range.

Electrical Characteristics.content: 6.1 Absolute Maximum Ratings: Specifies the maximum allowable voltage, current, power dissipation, and temperature ratings for the device. This includes the total power dissipation (PD), forward current (IF), ambient operating temperature (TA), and storage temperature (Tstg) limits.
6.2 Recommended Operating Conditions: Provides the recommended operating conditions for forward voltage (VF) and operating free-air temperature (TA) range.

6.3 Thermal Information: Provides thermal metrics such as junction-to-ambient thermal resistance (RθJA), junction-to-case thermal resistance (RθJC), junction-to-board thermal resistance (RθJB), and junction-to-top/board characterization parameters (ΨJT, ΨJB) for different package types.

6.4 Electrical Characteristics: Specifies the key electrical parameters for different part numbers, including zener voltage (VZ), zener impedance (ZZT), reverse leakage current (IR), temperature coefficient (SZ), and capacitance (CD) at specified test conditions (current and voltage levels).
